MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the  CH2 postcode area of Chester, affecting properties in Devon Road, Coniston Road and the surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6:21AM. Our engineers have arrived at the local substation to investigate suspected blown fuse. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 9:30AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:42AM on 4th March 2021
